duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain a high standard of network, server, and work station availability for all offices across the country.
Setup and support servers: Microsoft Server 2008, 2012 & 2016.
Setup and support Backup systems on Veeam & Backup Exec.
Administrate Active Directory, DFS, DHCP, DNS & Print Services.
Manage and support Extreme Networks Switches, Cisco Routers and Dell Sonic wall Firewalls.
Setup and manage VMWare environments for virtual servers and desktops.
Support and manage Microsoft SQL database environment.
Respond to requests for technical assistance in person, phone & electronically.
Troubleshoot all technical related user issues, including hardware, software, account, and printer issues.
Create and implement support documentation and procedures.
Create, implement and customize OS deployments and software.
Setup and support workstations and printers.
Setup new offices and assist in moving existing locations technology infrastructure.
Provide after-hours support for all critical systems as needed.
Create and implement training as needed and directed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in IT related field required
